name: FireProtection
title: Fire Protection
description: Fire Protection codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Property located within close proximity to a fire hydrant and fire station with adequate water supply and fire suppression infrastructure.
Property with partial access to municipal fire protection services, such as proximity to a fire station but limited water supply, or nearby hydrants with longer response times.
Property located beyond the effective range of municipal fire protection services, typically in rural areas without nearby fire hydrants or fire stations.
Property equipped with an automatic fire sprinkler system throughout the building or in critical areas.
